```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(leaflet)
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
dates <- data.frame(
  place = c("Cira Green", "Sunflower Field"),
  lat = c(39.953678, 40.228111),
  lng = c(-75.189819, -74.887222)
)
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
map <- leaflet(dates) %>%
  addProviderTiles(providers$CartoDB.Positron) %>%
  setView(lng = mean(dates$lng), lat = mean(dates$lat), zoom = 6) %>%
  addMarkers(~lng, ~lat, popup = ~place, label = ~place)

```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
map
```
